term.title: eclipsing strain

item.text: Intramolecularstrain present due to nonbonded interactions between two eclipsed atoms or groups. It is, for example, one of the interactions responsible for the existence of a rotational barrier and hence restricted rotation about the Câ€“C bond in ethane. It has also been called Pitzer strain, torsional strain and bond opposition strain.
